job_description:
Our team's currently partnered up with a company in the payments space, servicing on a B2B and B2C basis across North America, South America, Europe and Australia with almost 1000 employees positioned between those regions. At this time, their Canadian-based team is looking to bring on two new Software Development Engineers skilled in C#, .Net Core, server-side product development, design patterns, refactoring, and who have a background in HTML/CSS and one major cloud platform.

The opportunity is also fully remote across Canada.

Candidates who have experience in Payments and the listed tech stack are encouraged to apply! Required Skills & Experience
C#
.Net Core
Microservices
Experience working in payments, fintech, and/or financial services industries
At least four years of professional software development experience
Desired Skills & Experience
Bachelor of Science in Computer Science/Engineering or equivalent
What You Will Be Doing Tech Breakdown
80% .Net Core, C# and associated technologies
20% Azure, cloud services/ops work
Daily Responsibilities
80% Hands on
20% Team collaboration
The Offer
Bonus OR Commission eligible
You Will Receive The Following Benefits
Medical, Dental, Vision Insurance
Vacation Time, three weeks PTO
8% bonus, annual
RSP plans
Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the Canada on a full-time basis now and in the future.
